channel.title: Matrix 718 [Pk Tokens]
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering how to make 5 pk tokens (fist of guthix tokens) drop when you get a player kill in the wilderness. I would like them to only drop in the wilderness, and only when a player kills you, not an NPC and not when you die outside the wilderness.

item.title: Matrix 718 [Pk Tokens]
item.dc:creator: @lord0ftacos lord0ftacos
item.description:
@lord0ftacos wrote:

Hello, I was wondering how to make 5 pk tokens (fist of guthix tokens) drop when you get a player kill in the wilderness. I would like them to only drop in the wilderness, and only when a player kills you, not an NPC and not when you die outside the wilderness.
